instructions.name: createAmmConfig
docs: # Arguments
* `ctx`- The accounts needed by instruction.
* `index` - The index of amm config, there may be multiple config.
* `trade_fee_rate` - Trade fee rate, can be changed.
* `protocol_fee_rate` - The rate of protocol fee within tarde fee.
* `fund_fee_rate` - The rate of fund fee within tarde fee.

accounts.name: owner
docs: Address to be set as protocol owner.

accounts.name: ammConfig
docs: Initialize config state account to store protocol owner address and fee rates.

instructions.name: updateAmmConfig
docs: Updates the owner of the amm config
Must be called by the current owner or admin
# Arguments
* `ctx`- The context of accounts
* `trade_fee_rate`- The new trade fee rate of amm config, be set when `param` is 0
* `protocol_fee_rate`- The new protocol fee rate of amm config, be set when `param` is 1
* `fund_fee_rate`- The new fund fee rate of amm config, be set when `param` is 2
* `new_owner`- The config's new owner, be set when `param` is 3
* `new_fund_owner`- The config's new fund owner, be set when `param` is 4
* `param`- The vaule can be 0 | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4, otherwise will report a error

accounts.name: owner
docs: The amm config owner or admin

accounts.name: ammConfig
docs: Amm config account to be changed

instructions.name: updatePoolStatus
docs: Update pool status for given vaule
# Arguments
* `ctx`- The context of accounts
* `status` - The vaule of status

instructions.name: collectProtocolFee
docs: Collect the protocol fee accrued to the pool
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The context of accounts
* `amount_0_requested` - The maximum amount of token_0 to send, can be 0 to collect fees in only token_1
* `amount_1_requested` - The maximum amount of token_1 to send, can be 0 to collect fees in only token_0

accounts.name: owner
docs: Only admin or owner can collect fee now

accounts.name: poolState
docs: Pool state stores accumulated protocol fee amount

accounts.name: ammConfig
docs: Amm config account stores owner

accounts.name: token0Vault
docs: The address that holds pool tokens for token_0

accounts.name: token1Vault
docs: The address that holds pool tokens for token_1

accounts.name: vault0Mint
docs: The mint of token_0 vault

accounts.name: vault1Mint
docs: The mint of token_1 vault

accounts.name: recipientToken0Account
docs: The address that receives the collected token_0 protocol fees

accounts.name: recipientToken1Account
docs: The address that receives the collected token_1 protocol fees

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: The SPL program to perform token transfers

accounts.name: tokenProgram2022
docs: The SPL program 2022 to perform token transfers

instructions.name: collectFundFee
docs: Collect the fund fee accrued to the pool
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The context of accounts
* `amount_0_requested` - The maximum amount of token_0 to send, can be 0 to collect fees in only token_1
* `amount_1_requested` - The maximum amount of token_1 to send, can be 0 to collect fees in only token_0

accounts.name: owner
docs: Only admin or fund_owner can collect fee now

accounts.name: poolState
docs: Pool state stores accumulated protocol fee amount

accounts.name: ammConfig
docs: Amm config account stores fund_owner

accounts.name: token0Vault
docs: The address that holds pool tokens for token_0

accounts.name: token1Vault
docs: The address that holds pool tokens for token_1

accounts.name: vault0Mint
docs: The mint of token_0 vault

accounts.name: vault1Mint
docs: The mint of token_1 vault

accounts.name: recipientToken0Account
docs: The address that receives the collected token_0 fund fees

accounts.name: recipientToken1Account
docs: The address that receives the collected token_1 fund fees

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: The SPL program to perform token transfers

accounts.name: tokenProgram2022
docs: The SPL program 2022 to perform token transfers

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Creates a pool for the given token pair and the initial price
# Arguments
* `ctx`- The context of accounts
* `init_amount_0` - the initial amount_0 to deposit
* `init_amount_1` - the initial amount_1 to deposit
* `open_time` - the timestamp allowed for swap

accounts.name: creator
docs: Address paying to create the pool. Can be anyone

accounts.name: ammConfig
docs: Which config the pool belongs to.

accounts.name: poolState
docs: Initialize an account to store the pool state

accounts.name: token0Mint
docs: Token_0 mint, the key must smaller then token_1 mint.

accounts.name: token1Mint
docs: Token_1 mint, the key must grater then token_0 mint.

accounts.name: lpMint
docs: pool lp mint

accounts.name: creatorToken0
docs: payer token0 account

accounts.name: creatorToken1
docs: creator token1 account

accounts.name: creatorLpToken
docs: creator lp token account

accounts.name: createPoolFee
docs: create pool fee account

accounts.name: observationState
docs: an account to store oracle observations

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: Program to create mint account and mint tokens

accounts.name: token0Program
docs: Spl token program or token program 2022

accounts.name: token1Program
docs: Spl token program or token program 2022

accounts.name: associatedTokenProgram
docs: Program to create an ATA for receiving position NFT

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: To create a new program account

accounts.name: rent
docs: Sysvar for program account

instructions.name: deposit
docs: Creates a pool for the given token pair and the initial price
# Arguments
* `ctx`- The context of accounts
* `lp_token_amount` - Pool token amount to transfer. token_a and token_b amount are set by the current exchange rate and size of the pool
* `maximum_token_0_amount` -  Maximum token 0 amount to deposit, prevents excessive slippage
* `maximum_token_1_amount` - Maximum token 1 amount to deposit, prevents excessive slippage

accounts.name: owner
docs: Pays to mint the position

accounts.name: ownerLpToken
docs: Owner lp tokan account

accounts.name: token0Account
docs: The payer's token account for token_0

accounts.name: token1Account
docs: The payer's token account for token_1

accounts.name: token0Vault
docs: The address that holds pool tokens for token_0

accounts.name: token1Vault
docs: The address that holds pool tokens for token_1

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: token Program

accounts.name: tokenProgram2022
docs: Token program 2022

accounts.name: vault0Mint
docs: The mint of token_0 vault

accounts.name: vault1Mint
docs: The mint of token_1 vault

accounts.name: lpMint
docs: Lp token mint

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: Withdraw lp for token0 ande token1
# Arguments
* `ctx`- The context of accounts
* `lp_token_amount` - Amount of pool tokens to burn. User receives an output of token a and b based on the percentage of the pool tokens that are returned.
* `minimum_token_0_amount` -  Minimum amount of token 0 to receive, prevents excessive slippage
* `minimum_token_1_amount` -  Minimum amount of token 1 to receive, prevents excessive slippage

instructions.name: swapBaseInput
docs: Swap the tokens in the pool base input amount
# Arguments
* `ctx`- The context of accounts
* `amount_in` -  input amount to transfer, output to DESTINATION is based on the exchange rate
* `minimum_amount_out` -  Minimum amount of output token, prevents excessive slippage

accounts.name: payer

accounts.name: ammConfig
docs: The factory state to read protocol fees

accounts.name: poolState
docs: The program account of the pool in which the swap will be performed

accounts.name: outputTokenAccount

accounts.name: outputTokenMint

* `max_amount_in` -  input amount prevents excessive slippage
* `amount_out` -  amount of output token

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump to identify PDA

fields.name: disableCreatePool
docs: Status to control if new pool can be create

fields.name: index
docs: Config index

fields.name: tradeFeeRate
docs: The trade fee, denominated in hundredths of a bip (10^-6)

fields.name: protocolFeeRate
docs: The protocol fee

fields.name: fundFeeRate
docs: The fund fee, denominated in hundredths of a bip (10^-6)

fields.name: createPoolFee
docs: Fee for create a new pool

fields.name: protocolOwner
docs: Address of the protocol fee owner

fields.name: fundOwner
docs: Address of the fund fee owner

fields.name: padding
docs: padding

fields.name: initialized
docs: Whether the ObservationState is initialized

fields.name: observationIndex
docs: the most-recently updated index of the observations array

fields.name: observations
docs: observation array

fields.name: padding
docs: padding for feature update

fields.name: ammConfig
docs: Which config the pool belongs

fields.name: poolCreator
docs: pool creator

fields.name: token0Vault
docs: Token A

fields.name: token1Vault
docs: Token B

fields.name: lpMint
docs: Pool tokens are issued when A or B tokens are deposited.
Pool tokens can be withdrawn back to the original A or B token.

fields.name: token0Mint
docs: Mint information for token A

fields.name: token1Mint
docs: Mint information for token B

fields.name: token0Program
docs: token_0 program

fields.name: token1Program
docs: token_1 program

fields.name: observationKey
docs: observation account to store oracle data

fields.name: status
docs: Bitwise representation of the state of the pool
bit0, 1: disable deposit(vaule is 1), 0: normal
bit1, 1: disable withdraw(vaule is 2), 0: normal
bit2, 1: disable swap(vaule is 4), 0: normal

fields.name: mint0Decimals
docs: mint0 and mint1 decimals

fields.name: lpSupply
docs: lp mint supply

fields.name: protocolFeesToken0
docs: The amounts of token_0 and token_1 that are owed to the liquidity provider.

fields.name: openTime
docs: The timestamp allowed for swap in the pool.

fields.name: padding
docs: padding for future updates

types.name: Observation
docs: The element of observations in ObservationState

fields.name: blockTimestamp
docs: The block timestamp of the observation

fields.name: cumulativeToken0PriceX32
docs: the cumulative of token0 price during the duration time, Q32.32, the remaining 64 bit for overflow

fields.name: cumulativeToken1PriceX32
docs: the cumulative of token1 price during the duration time, Q32.32, the remaining 64 bit for overflow

types.name: TradeDirection
docs: The direction of a trade, since curves can be specialized to treat each
token differently (by adding offsets or weights)

types.name: RoundDirection
docs: The direction to round.  Used for pool token to trading token conversions to
avoid losing value on any deposit or withdrawal.

errors.name: InvalidOwner
errors.msg: Input account owner is not the program address

errors.name: IncorrectLpMint
errors.msg: Address of the provided lp token mint is incorrect

errors.name: ZeroTradingTokens
errors.msg: Given pool token amount results in zero trading tokens

errors.name: InitLpAmountTooLess
errors.msg: Init lp amount is too less(Because 100 amount lp will be locked)
